detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and a fastening with two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, decorative straps at the sides and high cut at the back.

Calf-length shirt dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted shorts in a soft weave with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and creases.
Shorts in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and one back pocket.

Jacket in washed denim with worn details and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tunic in a linen weave with a collar, V-neck and concealed button at the top. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with dropped shoulders with a small flounce trim.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a wide ribbed hem.

Short blouse in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit in a relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist. One ribbed pair and one patterned pair.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a glittery print on the front, vertical seam at the back and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Sturdy sandals with a hook and loop fastening, heel caps that are lightly padded at the top, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and patterned soles for a good grip.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and satin ribbon ties at the sides.
Soft, non-wired bra in satin and lace with triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hooded jacket in soft pile with an imitation leather appliqué on one sleeve and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, organic cotton textured knit with ribbing and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in jersey crêpe with a concealed zip at the back. 3/4-length sleeves with flounced trims, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Pointed-toe slingbacks with a narrow elastic heel strap, narrow, covered heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a neon-coloured print motif on the front, and decorative bows on the shoulders.
Lined, non-wired, one-shoulder bikini top. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Patterned silicone bracelet. Size 2.3x21 cm.
Bucket hat in a textured weave. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.
Jumper in a textured knit in soft chenille yarn with dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric lined with a pair of inner shorts. Wide, foldover ribbing at the waist for a more comfortable fit. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and a yoke with gathers at the back and on the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Hat in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the turned-up edge.
Shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in flock-patterned mesh. Round neckline with an opening and ties at the front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a smocked waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Deep neckline front and back and covered elastication at the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved top in soft slub jersey with a lace frill trim.
Leather mules with leather insoles and rubber soles.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with a round neck and dropped shoulders.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a wrapover front with soft draping at the top. Seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets, and wide, 3/4-length legs.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers. Classic T-shirt in jersey with a print motif. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Bomber jacket in sturdy jersey with a small stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, pleated skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a sewn-in belt with a round, covered buckle at the front and an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.
Short dungaree dress in washed denim with adjustable straps with a metal fastener, a chest pocket, front and back pockets and concealed zip in one side.
Gently fitted, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist and slim legs.
Jacket in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and long sleeves with an adjustable fastening at the cuffs. Unlined.

Sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Medium support.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a square neckline at the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in linen with a high waist, D-ring belt and buttons down the front. Large flap patch pockets at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hats in soft, printed jersey.

Short dress in chiffon crêpe with a lace yoke, cap sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and inset lace trims. Concealed zip at the back and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Short chiffon dress with a smocked stand-up collar and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Long sleeves with smocked cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Lined.
Pyjamas with a jersey Henley top and flannel bottoms. Top with a button placket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. The dress has a double layer of fabric at the top and narrow elastication at the waist. Unlined.

prod_name: TP MAGNUS sweatpant w panel SB
detail_desc: Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side stripes. Elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Pre-tied bow tie in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation leather with square toes, a zip in one side and block heels. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 9 cm.
